methods.createContext:
:param index: io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index
:param columnSource: io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.ColumnSource<java.lang.Short>
:param chunkSize: int
:param nPartitions: int
:param preserveEquality: boolean
:return: io.deephaven.db.v2.sort.partition.ShortPartitionKernel.PartitionKernelContext
methods.partition:
After we have created the context, we can determine what things are in a partition.

:param context: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sort.partition.ShortPartitionKernel.PartitionKernelContext) - our context, containing the pivots
:param indexKeys: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.LongChunk<io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.Attributes.KeyIndices>) - a chunk of index keys to partition
:param values: (io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.chunk.ShortChunk) - a chunk of values that go with the index keys
